祡字的基本解释

祡
chái
烧柴祭天。

祡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chái］
［《廣韻》士佳切，平佳，崇。］
古指烧柴生烟以祭天。

祡字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　祡； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页842第07
〔古文〕?【廣韻】士佳切【集韻】【韻會】鉏佳切【正韻】牀皆切，?音柴。【說文】燒柴燓燎，以祭天神。【揚雄·甘泉賦】欽祡宗祈。　又同柴。【書·舜典】至于岱宗柴。【說文】引書作祡。【正字通】按祡本作柴，後人因祭天，改从示。別詳木部柴字註。

祡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
祡字的起名意思

暂无。

祡
Basic explanation of words
祡
chái
Burn wood to worship the sky.
祡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chái］
["Guangyun" Shi Jiaqie, Pingjia, Chong. ]
In ancient times, it meant burning wood and making smoke to worship the sky.
祡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Department of Showing Characters] 　祡; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 842 Page 07
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] Shi Jiaqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Jia Jiaqi [Zheng Yun] The beds are all cut,? Yin Chai. [Speaking text] Burning firewood to sacrifice to the gods. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Qin Xie Zong Qi.　 Same Chai again. 【Book·Shun Dian】As for Dai Zongchai. [Said the text] Quoting the book. 【Zhengzitong】The firewood was made according to the original version, and later generations changed to follow the instructions for offering sacrifices to the sky. Don't specify Mubuchai.
